body: It's as wholesome as it can get. I mean, the douche left her behind. Not even a message... nothing.

with vanilla story like progress and ending.*

@SchrodingerZ Very well said man. Few things making this story "vanilla like" is overall how sweet this story is in progress and amazing ending. Husband feels like not interested in her anymore from the start, that's why he divorced here. Cheating, romance & drama is what we have here overall with vanilla like story progress is ending. Even with some cheating in here, this goes in a good way because her husband was not interested in her from start or even before. Once again I just love that story and this is definitely in my top 3 favourite, maybe even deserving first place. This story seems real too.

10/10 This is amazing and unique!!! Recommended to anyone. This is one of the best vanilla, wholesome and overall hentai i ever saw, deffinitely in my Top3 and maybe deserve first place. I will remember that for long. Hentai with a long and good story like that is really really rare now, level of good normal manga/webtoon, but shorter. That manga have like 1.5 year overall and 9 months from last chapter so i'm suprised i missed it all and yesterday accidentally saw image comment on fb post so i'm glad i found it. I hope more stories like that will be in future. I'll be glad if someone recommend me something similar to this.
